database.name: Oracle
database.select: SELECT t.table_name TABLE_NAME, t.tablespace_name TABLESPACE, c.comments DESCRIPTION FROM user_tables t, user_tab_comments c WHERE t.table_name=c.table_name ORDER BY t.table_name

SELECT t.COLUMN_NAME COLUMN_NAME, t.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, t.DATA_TYPE DATA_TYPE, t.CHAR_LENGTH CHAR_LENGTH, t.DATA_LENGTH DATA_LENGTH, t.DATA_PRECISION DATA_PRECISION, t.DATA_SCALE DATA_SCALE, t.NULLABLE NULLABLE, c.COMMENTS DESCRIPTION, t.DATA_DEFAULT DEFAULT_VALUE FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS t, USER_COL_COMMENTS c WHERE t.TABLE_NAME = c.TABLE_NAME AND t.COLUMN_NAME = c.COLUMN_NAME AND t.TABLE_NAME = ? ORDER BY t.COLUMN_ID

SELECT ucc.constraint_name CONSTRAINT_NAME, ucc.TABLE_NAME TABLE_NAME, ucc.COLUMN_NAME COLUMN_NAME FROM user_cons_columns ucc, user_constraints uc WHERE ucc.constraint_name=uc.constraint_name AND uc.constraint_type='P' AND ucc.table_name=? ORDER BY ucc.constraint_name

SELECT fkt.constraint_name FK_NAME, pkt.table_name PK_TABLE_NAME, pkc.column_name PK_COLUMN_NAME, fkt.table_name FK_TABLE_NAME, fkc.column_name FK_COLUMN_NAME FROM user_constraints fkt, user_constraints pkt, user_cons_columns fkc, user_cons_columns pkc WHERE fkt.r_constraint_name=pkt.constraint_name AND fkt.constraint_type='R' AND pkt.constraint_type='P' AND fkt.r_owner=pkt.owner AND fkt.constraint_name=fkc.constraint_name AND pkt.constraint_name=pkc.constraint_name AND fkt.owner=fkc.owner AND fkt.table_name=fkc.table_name AND pkt.owner=pkc.owner AND pkt.table_name=pkc.table_name AND pkt.table_name=? ORDER BY fkt.constraint_name

SELECT uic.index_name INDEX_NAME, ui.index_type INDEX_TYPE, uic.table_name TABLE_NAME, uic.column_name COLUMN_NAME, ui.uniqueness IS_UNIQUE FROM user_ind_columns uic, user_indexes ui WHERE uic.index_name = ui.index_name AND uic.table_name = ui.table_name AND uic.table_name = ? ORDER BY uic.index_name

SELECT trigger_name TRIGGER_NAME, trigger_type TRIGGER_TYPE, triggering_event EVENT_TYPE, trigger_body TRIGGER_BODY, description DESCRIPTION FROM user_triggers WHERE table_name=? ORDER BY TRIGGER_NAME
